<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Parting Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=1724) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=47) (Level 6)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a loaded ranged weapon or a ranged weapon with [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254).

</column>

---

You jump back and fire a quick shot that catches your opponent off guard. You Step and then make a ranged Strike with the required weapon. Your target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the attack.
